# didClone(from:)

**Instance Method**

Tells a newly cloned entity that cloning is complete.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func didClone(from source: Entity)
```

## Parameters

- **source**: The entity from which the cloned entity was copied.

## Discussion

This method clones all component data automatically. When you clone an entity that stores custom data that’s not part of a component, override the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity/didClone(from:)] method to copy that data manually after the clone finishes.

## Creating an entity

- **init()**: Creates a new entity.
- **clone(recursive:)**: Duplicates an entity to create a new entity.
